content: Internet and complete any other fields that might be applicable for your situation, such as Purchase Order, Notify Email, and so on. Then, click Continue. 13.Review what you submitted carefully for accuracy. This is your only chance to correct any mistakes. 14.If everything looks correct, click Submit.
